structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: Listing of boarding homes to be maintained.
law.text: The secretary shall maintain a listing of all registered boarding homes which shall be updated at least quarterly. At the time the list is updated, the cabinet shall submit the list of registered boarding homes to the local health department and fire department in counties containing registered boarding homes.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 439, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990.
